Class Team

java.lang.Object
cscd212classes.lab3.Team
All Implemented Interfaces:
Payroll, Comparable<Team>
public class Team extends Object implements Payroll, Comparable<Team>
The Team class that defines the information about a team.

  • Constructor Details

    • Team

      public Team(String city, String teamName, Player[] players) throws CloneNotSupportedException
      The Team constructor is for the stand alone class named Team. At the end of the constructor you will calculate the payroll
      Parameters:
      city - Representing the city
      teamName - Representing the team name
      players - a ArrayList of Player that holds the player objects
      Throws:
      CloneNotSupportedException - Put throws CloneNotSupportedException on the constructor header
      IllegalArgumentException - If the Strings are null or empty and if players array is null or the length is <= 0
      NOTE You must create a new ArrayList and then clone each player before adding the player to the list

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string with city - team name CR Payroll: $value CR Taxes: $this calculateTaxes CR Player Name TABTAB SSN TABTAB Salary TABTAB Position TABTAB Stats TABTAB Jersey Number CR The player info
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String representing the above information see sample output run
      NOTE don't worry about pretty output
      NOTE The payroll and calculate taxes will be done using DecimalFormat with "$#,###,###,###.00"

    • calculatePayroll

      public int calculatePayroll()
      calculatePayroll - sums the player salary to create the payroll including the base_payroll from the interface Walks thru the ArrayList and sums the player salaries
      Specified by:
      calculatePayroll in interface Payroll
      Returns:
      int the summed player salaries
